name: Yeti Tyke
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Keen Smell: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Snow Camouflage: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.
